name: StaySober
description:
Description : 

StaySober is a game made in 2 small days with a Team of 6 people!

The theme was to recreate a Vampire Survivor's like.

Credits :

- Charlet Samuel, Game Programmer

-  Batsleer Cyane, Game Artist

-  Gournay Victor, Game Artist

- Liferki Selma, Game Artist

- Laurent Ambre , Game Designer

- Vangilluwen Paul , Game Designer

Thanks to our professor Esteves Aurélien for organizing this jam.

How to Play :

Use your controllers only !

Left joystick to move.

Right joystick to aim.
